TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskFactory extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对创建和计划 对象的支持。

span.span: Provides support for creating and scheduling objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 提供了两个用于创建和计划任务的工厂：The .NET Framework provides two factories for creating and scheduling tasks: - 类，该类创建 和 对象。The class, which creates and objects. 可以调用此方法的重载来创建和执行需要非默认参数的任务。You can call the overloads of this method to create and execute a task that requires non-default arguments. > [!WARNING] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始， 方法提供了使用默认配置值创建任务并立即启动该任务的最简单方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately. - 类，该类用于创建 对象。The class, which creates objects. 通过 类，您可以执行以下操作：The class allows you to do the following: - 创建一个任务，并通过调用 方法立即启动该任务。Create a task and start it immediately by calling the method. > [!WARNING] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始， 方法提供了使用默认配置值创建任务并立即启动该任务的最简单方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately. - 创建一个任务，该任务将在数组中的任一任务完成后通过调用 方法来启动。Create a task that starts when any one of the tasks in an array has completed by calling the method. - 创建一个任务，该任务在数组中的所有任务都已完成时通过调用 方法来启动。Create a task that starts when all the tasks in an array have completed by calling the method. Static 属性返回默认 对象。The static property returns a default object. 还可以调用 类构造函数之一来配置 类创建的 对象。You can also call one of the class constructors to configure the objects that the class creates. 下面的示例将新的 对象配置为创建具有指定的取消标记、任务创建选项、继续选项和自定义任务计划程序的任务。The following example configures a new object to create tasks that have a specified cancellation token, task creation options, continuation options, and a customized task scheduler. [!code-csharp[TPL_Factories#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TPL_Factories#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/vb/factories_vb.vb#1)] 在大多数情况下，您不必实例化新的 实例。In most cases, you do not have to instantiate a new instance. 相反，可以使用 属性，该属性返回使用默认值的工厂对象。Instead, you can use the property, which returns a factory object that uses default values. 然后，可以调用其方法来启动新任务或定义任务延续。You can then call its methods to start new tasks or define task continuations. 有关说明，请参阅示例。For an illustration, see the example. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 static 属性对 方法进行两次调用。The following example uses the static property to make two calls to the method. 第一种方式是使用用户的 MyDocuments 目录中的文件名称填充数组，而第二次使用用户的 MyDocuments 目录的子目录名称填充数组。The first populates an array with the names of files in the user's MyDocuments directory, while the second populates an array with the names of subdirectories of the user's MyDocuments directory. 然后，它调用 方法，该方法显示前两个任务完成执行后两个数组中文件和目录的数量信息。It then calls the method, which displays information about the number of files and directories in the two arrays after the first two tasks have completed execution. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/cs/factory1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/vb/factory1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建一个延续任务，该任务在一组指定的任务完成后开始。

span.span: Creates a continuation task that starts when a set of specified tasks has completed.
The new continuation task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `tasks` 数组中的所有任务都已完成时，无论其完成状态如何， 方法都将执行 `continuationAction` 委托。The method executes the `continuationAction` delegate when all tasks in the `tasks` array have completed, regardless of their completion status. 由 `tasks` 数组中的任务引发的异常通过结构化异常处理不能用于延续任务。Exceptions thrown by tasks in the `tasks` array are not available to the continuation task through structured exception handling. 您可以通过检查 `tasks` 数组中每个任务的 属性来确定引发了哪些异常。You can determine which exceptions were thrown by examining the property of each task in the `tasks` array. 若要使用结构化异常处理来处理 `tasks` 数组中的任务引发的异常，请调用 方法。To use structured exception handling to handle exceptions thrown by tasks in the `tasks` array, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例启动了单独的任务，这些任务使用正则表达式来计算一组文本文件中的单词数。The following example launches separate tasks that use a regular expression to count the number of words in a set of text files. 方法用于启动在所有前面的任务都完成时显示字数总计的任务。The method is used to launch a task that displays the total word count when all the antecedent tasks have completed. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ContinueWhenAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.continuewhenall/cs/continuewhenall1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ContinueWhenAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.continuewhenall/vb/continuewhenall1.vb#1)] 对延续任务的 方法的调用不允许它处理前面的任务引发的异常，因此该示例检查每个前面的任务的 属性，以确定该任务是否成功。The call to the continuation task's method does not allow it to handle exceptions thrown by the antecedent tasks, so the example examines the property of each antecedent task to determine whether the task succeeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `tasks` 数组中的所有任务都已完成时，此方法会执行 `continuationAction` 委托，而不考虑它们的完成状态。This method executes the `continuationAction` delegate when all tasks in the `tasks` array have completed, regardless of their completion status. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个取消标记，并将其传递给单独的任务，这些任务使用正则表达式来计算一组文本文件中的单词数。The following example creates a cancellation token, which it passes to separate tasks that use a regular expression to count the number of words in a set of text files. 如果找不到文件，则设置取消标记。The cancellation token is set if a file cannot be found. `ContinueWhenAll(Task[], Action{Task[]}, CancellationToken)` 方法用于启动在所有前面的任务都完成时显示字数总计的任务。The `ContinueWhenAll(Task[], Action{Task[]}, CancellationToken)` method is used to launch a task that displays the total word count when all the antecedent tasks have completed. 如果设置了取消标记（表示已取消一个或多个任务），则它将处理 异常并显示错误消息。If the cancellation token is set, which indicates that one or more tasks have been cancelled, it handles the exception and displays an error message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值用于计划所有任务，除非在调用此工厂的方法期间显式指定了另一个计划程序。The property value is used to schedule all tasks, unless another scheduler is explicitly specified during calls to this factory's methods. 如果此属性值为 `null`，则使用 属性的值。If this property value is `null`, the value of the property is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始， 方法是启动计算限制任务的建议方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method is the recommended way to launch a compute-bound task. 仅当需要对长时间运行、计算限制的任务进行精细控制时才使用 方法。Use the method only when you require fine-grained control for a long-running, compute-bound task. 这包括要控制以下各项的方案：This includes scenarios in which you want to control the following: - 任务创建选项。Task creation options. 默认情况下，由 方法创建的任务使用 选项创建。Tasks created by the method by default are created with the option. 若要重写此行为，或要提供其他 选项，请调用 重载。To override this behavior, or to provide other options, call a overload. - 参数通过。Parameter passing. 方法的重载不允许将参数传递给任务委托。The overloads of the method do not allow you to pass a parameter to the task delegate. 方法的重载。Overloads of the method do. - 任务计划程序。The task scheduler. 方法的重载使用默认的任务计划程序。The overloads of the method use the default task scheduler. 若要控制任务计划程序，请使用 `scheduler` 参数调用 重载。To control the task scheduler, call a overload with a `scheduler` parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 在功能上等效于使用它的一个构造函数创建任务，然后调用 方法来计划任务的执行。Calling is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of its constructors, and then calling the method to schedule the task for execution. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，你可以使用 方法快速地使用默认参数调用 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the method as a quick way to call with default parameters. 但请注意，这两个方法之间的行为有不同之处：默认情况下， 不允许使用 选项启动子任务以附加到当前 实例，而 执行。Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : by default does not allow child tasks started with the option to attach to the current instance, whereas does. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅与 .NET 并行编程中的[StartNew Vs 任务](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)。For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法重复调用一个 委托，该委托生成一个随机数，将其解释为 Unicode 码位，并将其转换为 UTF16 编码的代码单元，并显示有关结果字符的信息或符.The following example uses the method to repeatedly invoke an delegate that generates a random number, interprets it as a Unicode code point, converts it to a UTF16-encoded code unit, and displays information about the resulting character or characters. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/cs/startnew1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/vb/startnew1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 `StartNew` 在功能上等效于使用它的一个构造函数创建任务，然后调用 将其计划为执行。Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a Task using one of its constructors and then calling to schedule it for execution. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，你可以使用 方法快速地使用默认参数调用 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the method as a quick way to call with default parameters. 但请注意，这两个方法之间的行为有不同之处：默认情况下， 不允许使用 选项启动子任务以附加到当前 实例，而 执行。Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : by default does not allow child tasks started with the option to attach to the current instance, whereas does. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅与 .NET 并行编程中的[StartNew Vs 任务](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)。For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 方法来创建一个用于循环访问 C:\Windows\System32 目录中的文件的任务。The following example calls the method to create a task that iterates the files in the C:\Windows\System32 directory. Lambda 表达式调用 方法，将有关每个文件的信息添加到 对象。The lambda expression calls the method to add information about each file to a object. 由 循环调用的每个分离的嵌套任务会检查取消标记的状态，如果请求取消，则调用 方法。Each detached nested task invoked by the loop checks the state of the cancellation token and, if cancellation is requested, calls the method. 当调用线程调用 方法时， 方法引发在 `catch` 块中处理的 异常。The method throws an exception that is handled in a `catch` block when the calling thread calls the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/cs/startnew2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/vb/startnew2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 StartNew 在功能上等效于使用它的一个构造函数创建任务，然后调用 将其计划为执行。Calling StartNew is functionally equivalent to creating a Task using one of its constructors and then calling to schedule it for execution. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，可以将 方法与 的对象一起使用，作为使用默认参数调用 的快捷方式。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the method with an object as a quick way to call with default parameters. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅与 .NET 并行编程中的[StartNew Vs 任务](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)。For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个由6个字母构成的单词的数组。The following example defines an array of 6-letter words. 然后，将每个单词传递到 委托，该委托会打乱该词并显示原始单词及其已打乱的版本。Each word is then passed to an delegate, which scrambles the word and displays the original word and its scrambled version. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/cs/startnew4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/vb/startnew4.vb#4)] 请注意，此示例初始化一个由锁保护的单个随机数生成器。Note that the example initializes a single random number generator, which is protected by a lock. 如果需要锁，请参阅 类主题中的 "System.web class and thread 安全网"。For the need of a lock, see "The System.Random class and thread safety" in the class topic. 若要处理随机数生成器损坏的可能性，请将取消标记传递给任务。To handle the possibility of corruption of the random number generator, a cancellation token is passed to task. 如果两个随机数等于零，则该方法假定随机数生成器已损坏并设置取消标记。If two random numbers equal zero, the method assumes that the random number generator is corrupted and sets the cancellation token. 在将包含六个字符的 `chars` 数组排序之前，该方法将调用 方法，以便在标记已取消时引发 。Before sorting the `chars` array that contains the six characters in a word, the method calls the method to throw an if the token has been canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 在功能上等效于使用它的一个构造函数创建 ，然后调用 来计划它的执行。Calling is functionally equivalent to creating a using one of its constructors and then calling to schedule it for execution. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，可以调用 方法，作为使用默认参数调用 的快捷方式。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can call the method as a quick way to call with default parameters. 但请注意，这两个方法之间的行为有不同之处：默认情况下， 不允许使用 选项启动子任务以附加到当前 实例，而 执行。Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : by default does not allow child tasks started with the option to attach to the current instance, whereas does. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅入门[任务。](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)在与 .Net 的并行编程中运行 StartNew。For more information and code examples, see the entry [Task.Run vs. Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个简单的加法应用，它会生成两个随机数并提示用户输入其总和。The following example is a simple addition app that generates two random numbers and prompts the user to enter their sum. 然后，它指示答案是否正确，或者如果用户的响应不是有效的数字，则会提示用户重新输入有效的数字。It then indicates whether the answer is correct or, if the user's response is not a valid number, prompts the user to re-enter a valid number. 用于创建返回要添加的随机数的 对象。The is used to create the objects that return the random numbers to add. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 StartNew 在功能上等效于使用它的一个构造函数创建 ，然后调用 来计划执行。Calling StartNew is functionally equivalent to creating a using one of its constructors and then calling to schedule it for execution. 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，可以将 方法与 的对象一起使用，作为使用默认参数调用 的快捷方式。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the method with an object as a quick way to call with default parameters. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅入门[任务。](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)在与 .Net 的并行编程中运行 StartNew。For more information and code examples, see the entry [Task.Run vs. Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
